## Basic vocab

(a subset of [adv-r.had.co.nz/Vocabulary.html](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/Vocabulary.html))

<br/>

```R
# Important operators and assignment
%in%, match
assign, get

# Comparison
!=, ==, >, >=, <, <=
is.na

# Basic math
*, +, -, /, ^
abs
acos, asin, atan, atan2
sin, cos, tan
ceiling, floor, round
exp, log, log10, log2, sqrt

max, min, sum, diff
range
mean, median, cor, sd, var


# Functions to do with functions
function
return

# Logical & sets 
&, |, !
which

# Vectors and matrices
c, matrix
length, dim, ncol, nrow
cbind, rbind
names, colnames, rownames
t
diag
as.matrix

# Making vectors 
c
rep, rep_len
seq, seq_len, seq_along
rev
sample

# Lists & data.frames 
list, unlist
data.frame, as.data.frame
expand.grid

# Control flow 
if, for, while
next, break
ifelse

# Apply & friends
apply, lapply, sapply, vapply

# Date time
ISOdate, ISOdatetime, strftime, strptime, date
difftime
julian, months, quarters, weekdays

# Character manipulation 
grepl
gsub
strsplit
nchar
tolower, toupper
substr
paste
trimws

# Factors 
factor, levels, nlevels
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# Ordering and tabulating 
unique
merge
order, rank, quantile
sort

# Linear models 
lm, predict, confint

# Random variables 
(q, p, d, r) * (beta, binom, norm, chisq, exp, lnorm, t, unif)

# Workspace 
ls, exists, rm
getwd, setwd
source
install.packages, library, require

# Debugging
traceback
browser
stop, warning, message
tryCatch, try

# Output
print, cat
message, warning

# Reading and writing data
read.csv, write.csv
readLines, writeLines
load, save

# Files and directories 
dir
basename, dirname
file.path
path.expand, normalizePath
file.choose
file.copy, file.create, file.remove, file.rename, dir.create
file.exists, file.info
tempdir, tempfile

```
